already-account: Already Have An Account? Login Here
check-email: Check your email to complete the creation of your account!
join-request-sent: Your join request has been sent to the tournament admin!
already-request-sent: You already sent a request to join this tournament. Please wait or contact the tournament admin to be approved.
request-rejected: You have been rejected to join this tournament and cannot try to join again
not-tournament-yet: You are not in any tournament yet! Look for a tournament in the search bar or create your own
htp-1: You will be able to complete the predict a match score before it begins. Do not forget to click SAVE PREDICTIONS to update the results
htp-2: Suspended/Cancelled/Postponed matches in leagues will not be considered.
htp-3: If you hit the winner or draw, you will get 1 point. If you get the exact outcome, you will get 3 points. 0 points if you miss the outcome
htp-4: The ranking is based on total points. In case of a tie, the user with more exact outcomes will be ranked higher
htp-5: You can create as many tournaments and join as many as you like
permission-media-required: Permission to access media library is required
add-tournament-description: Add a description for your tournament (optional)
couldnt-send-reset-email: Could not send password reset email.
check-email-password-link: Check your email for a password reset link.
create-tournament-tapping-button: Create a tournament by tapping the button below
ads-not-loaded: Ads not loaded, try again in a few seconds
left-review: Left us a review and get {{coins}} coins!
hiw-1-description: Between Europe, America, Asia or Africa.
hiw-2-description: The exact result before the start or the match.
hiw-3-description: And redeem coins beating players all around the world.
hiw-5-description: Challenge your friends and prove you have more football knowledge.
compete-with-friends: Compete with friends and fans all around the world in the most complete football predictions game.
users-download-and-access:
Users can download and access 
 directly from the mobile app
compete-predict-climb: Compete with friends, Predict results and Climb the Leaderboard
you-havent-saved: You haven't saved your predictions yet
